Vegetal Powder Hair Color (Soft Black) Price: Rs.599

Vegetal Bio Hair Colour is 100% Natural hair care and colouring formulation. It colours your hair effectively by coating the hair shaft in desired colour
column14: while conditioning and protecting your hair. Damaged hair regains it's shine and softness with regular use of Vegetal Bio Hair Colour. So if you are allergic to chemicals and have sensitive skin
column15: this chemical free hair color is exactly what you need.
